title: where do i start to learn about the lore of league
body:
i know nothing except some champ bios, feel me in with text/videos/etc.

im too curious

replies.body:
Your timing is phenomenal {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

As Kejsarpingvin mentioned, the beta for http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/ started today.

this is perfect
when can i expect League of Legends: The Movie? kappa

This is a really good youtube playlist that explains the entire LoL lore

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLhTQCx4uEh7Gdm0nduXnB43sj022gLGqe
thank you! was a good watch :)
